text: Pseudebulea fentoni is a moth in the family Crambidae. It was described by Arthur Gardiner Butler in 1881. It is found in Japan, Korea and the Russian Far East (Ussuri). ==Subspecies== *Pseudebulea fentoni fentoni *Pseudebulea fentoni koreensis Munroe & Mutuura, 1968 (Korea) *Pseudebulea fentoni sadoensis Munroe & Mutuura, 1968 (Japan: Honshu) *Pseudebulea fentoni ussuriensis Munroe & Mutuura, 1968 (Russia: Ussuri) *Pseudebulea fentoni yezoensis Munroe & Mutuura, 1968 (Japan: Hokkaido) ==References== Category:Moths described in 1881 Category:Pyraustinae
title: Pseudebulea fentoni
